events.name: Nickel mine
events.wd_description: A nickel mine is a mine that produces nickel.
events.description: A nickel mine is a mine that produces nickel.

events.name: Geology of nickel ore
events.wd_description: Nickel occurs in two general types of ores, sulfides and oxides.
events.description: Nickel occurs in two general types of ores, sulfides and oxides.

events.name: Extraction of nickel from sulfide ores
events.wd_label: Extraction of nickel from sulfide ores
events.wd_description: Sulfide ores are subjected to comminution followed by froth flotation.
events.description: Sulfide ores are subjected to comminution followed by froth flotation.

events.name: Extraction of nickel from laterite ores
events.wd_label: Extraction of nickel from laterite ores
events.wd_description: Two hydrometallurgical methods have been developed to extract nickel and cobalt from nickel laterites.
events.description: Two hydrometallurgical methods have been developed to extract nickel and cobalt from nickel laterites.

events.name: Extraction of nickel from high-magnesium silicates in lower profiles laterites
events.wd_label: Extraction of nickel from high-magnesium silicates in lower profiles laterites
events.wd_description: The exploitation method used is smelting.
events.description: The exploitation method used is smelting.

events.name: Iron sulfides
events.wd_description: Nickel is often a constituent of iron sulfides such as pyrrhotite.
events.description: Nickel is often a constituent of iron sulfides such as pyrrhotite.

events.name: Pyrrhotite
events.wd_description: An iron sulfide mineral containing nickel.
events.description: An iron sulfide mineral containing nickel.

events.name: Sulfide ores
events.wd_description: Nickel occurs in sulfide ores, with pentlandite being the most important type.
events.description: Nickel occurs in sulfide ores, with pentlandite being the most important type.

events.name: Pentlandite
events.wd_description: The principal sulfide ore of nickel, supplying an estimated 65% of the world's nickel.
events.description: The principal sulfide ore of nickel, supplying an estimated 65% of the world's nickel.

events.name: Iron sulfides
events.wd_description: Nickel is often a constituent of iron sulfides such as pyrrhotite.
